job.title: Software Engineer - Network Access
job.description:
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Software Engineer - Network Access
Mastercard is a global technology company in the payments industry. Our mission is to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart, and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments, and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. With connections across more than 210 countries and territories, we are building a sustainable world that unlocks priceless possibilities for all.
Network Access is the core provider of network connectivity and edge computing capabilities for payments and non payment transactions. Whether at a customer site, within Mastercard's own data center, or in the public cloud, we provide the secure, unified single point of entry for all Account to Account, Blockchain, Card, and Data transactions.
We are currently seeking a passionate & collaborative software engineer to join our Network Access team. As an associate engineer in Network Access, you will have the opportunity to develop solutions that directly impact/enable millions of global transactions that occur each day. You will play a vital role within a rapidly growing organization, while working closely with experienced and driven engineers to solve challenging problems.
Are you a collaborator, able to engage across your team & beyond?
Are you an innovator who embraces, adopts, and studies the latest technology to solve challenging business problems?
If this describes you, Mastercard wants to talk to you about joining our Squad.
===================================
===================================
===================================
BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent
Due to COVID-19, most of our employees are working from home. We’ve implemented a virtual hiring process and continue to interview candidates by phone or video and are onboarding new hires remotely. We value the safety of each member of our community because we know we’re all in this together.
